p: Self-emulsifying formulations, that consist of oils, surfactants, co-surfactants, and drugs, should be a clear and monophasic liquid when introduced to aqueous phase at ambient temperature and should have good solvent capacity to present the drug into solution. 21 The solubility of MTX in various vehicles is shown in Figure 1. The interactions between drugs and excipients could be known from solubility screening results.
